meanings.definition: A magnetic tape on which sound can be recorded.
meanings.sent1: I found some old audiotapes in the attic.
meanings.sent2: She listened to the audiotapes of her favorite songs.
meanings.sent3: The audiotapes whispered secrets from the past.
meanings.sent4: His memories were stored on the audiotapes of his mind.
meanings.sent5: The audiotapes hummed with the voices of the past.

meanings.sent1: The audiotapes contained interviews with famous musicians.
meanings.sent2: He shared the audiotapes of his stand-up comedy routines.
meanings.sent3: The audiotapes played a prank by skipping in the middle of the song.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the audiotapes like a melody.
meanings.sent5: The audiotapes captured the essence of the live performance.
